title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
After a disappointing loss to the Chiefs without Amari Cooper who is also expected to miss their Thanksgiving Day match up against the Raiders, Colin believes Jerry Jones is ready to move on from the star wide receiver. He lays out why the Bears should be considered a top destination for head coaching candidates if the team decides to move on from Matt Nagy. He shares his Blazing 5 picks for week 12 of the NFL season. Plus, Greg Cosell joins the show to discuss the Bills struggles on offense and the rise of the Patriots defense.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
